editable.en: For us the notion of sharing during the collection of donations is very important, having been part of many associative clubs, the notion of sharing was not always present. We want donors, volunteers and active members to feel a connection with these children. That he can feel the fact that their actions for the association are paying off and serve an important cause. That they themselves are important for the future of these children. This is why we want to create events for collecting donations, to share this adventure together and that everyone can feel important within this family that is Orphelindia. Of course when the organization of events will be impossible in places we will find means through networks and online, also helped by product sales.

Nous voulons que les donateurs, les b√©n√©voles et les membres actifs se sentent en lien avec ces enfants. Qu'il puisse ressentir le fait que leurs actions pour l'association portent leurs fruits et servent une cause importante. Qu'ils sont eux-m√™mes importants pour l'avenir de ces enfants. C'est pourquoi nous voulons cr√©er des √©v√©nements pour collecter des dons, pour partager cette aventure ensemble et que chacun puisse se sentir important au sein de cette famille qu'est Orphelindia. Bien s√ªr, lorsque l'organisation d'√©v√©nements sera impossible dans certains endroits, nous trouverons des moyens par le biais de r√©seaux et en ligne, √©galement aid√©s par la vente de produits.

editable.en: Orphelindia is an association under the law of 1901 which helps orphans in Sri Lanka, India, and Mauritius. The idea of creating this association dates back several years. The orphan cause is particularly close to my heart because my father has been an orphan himself. since he was a child, he had to learn quickly to fend for himself and to miss several years of school for lack of means. He often told me that if he had had someone to push him to go far and study for a long time, he would surely have succeeded even better than he does today. Even though I am proud of everything he has achieved and the path he has taken, I took his words into consideration. So, today I want to be one of the people who will push these children to do their best. but also a person who can give them a taste for school and education, which is, in my opinion, the driving pillar of our society. Education is the most important thing in a child's life, it is a chance that can allow Them to build Their own future.

La cause des orphelins me tient particuli√®rement √† c≈ìur car mon p√®re a lui-m√™me √©t√© orphelin. D√®s son enfance, il a d√ª apprendre rapidement √† se d√©brouiller seul et manquer plusieurs ann√©es d'√©cole par manque de moyens. Il me disait souvent que s'il avait eu quelqu'un pour le pousser √† aller loin et √† √©tudier longtemps, il aurait s√ªrement r√©ussi encore mieux qu'aujourd'hui. M√™me si je suis fier de tout ce qu'il a accompli et du chemin qu'il a parcouru, j'ai pris ses paroles en consid√©ration. Alors, aujourd'hui, je veux √™tre l'une des personnes qui poussera ces enfants √† faire de leur mieux. Mais aussi une personne qui pourra leur donner le go√ªt de l'√©cole et de l'√©ducation, qui est, √† mon avis, le pilier moteur de notre soci√©t√©. L'√©ducation est la chose la plus importante dans la vie d'un enfant, c'est une chance qui peut leur permettre de construire leur propre avenir.

editable.en: To create events that would allow us to collect donations that we will use to buy the necessary materials for the orphanage that we will help, according to their request.  We are currently working on the creation of a website on which it will be possible to find all the information about the association as well as photos of the orphanage in Sri Lanka. We also want to create a way to make an online donation.

Nous travaillons actuellement √† la cr√©ation d'un site internet sur lequel il sera possible de trouver toutes les informations sur l'association ainsi que des photos de l'orphelinat au Sri Lanka. Nous souhaitons √©galement cr√©er un moyen de faire un don en ligne

editable.en: To be able to buy the necessary materials (notebooks, books, tables, tables, etc.) and manage to have them delivered directly to Sri Lanka by buying on markets close to them, such as in India, for example, or to send them directly part of the donations collected by bank transfer (the other part will obviously be used to organise other events).

editable.en: To be able to go to Sri Lanka to see the help Orphelindia is giving in the orphanage, to see how we can continue to help them, and to meet the residents and spend time with them.
